body.name: Twelve South AirFly Pro Bluetooth Wireless Audio Transmitter/ Receiver for up to 2 AirPods /Wireless Headphones; Use with any 3.5 mm Jack on Airplanes, Gym Equipment, TVs, iPad/Tablets and Auto
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

features: NO MORE CORDS: Wirelessly transmit audio from in-flight entertainment, gym equipment, gaming devices, TV's or any 3.5 audio jack. Use your AirPods, earbuds or wireless headphones anywhere with no more cords in the way. Now you don't have to sacrifice audio quality/comfort in flight.

NEVER RUN OUT OF BATTERY LIFE : AirFly Pro has a battery life of 25+ hours to cover even the longest flight. If you forget to charge before take off, AirFly Pro can be used while charging with the included cable.
TRANSMIT / RECEIVE WITHOUT WIRES: AirFly Pro has a 10m/33ft reach so you can relax with plenty of space to enjoy your content.

Use AirFly Pro where there is no Bluetooth available to allow item such as wired speakers/soundbars, rental cars, and boat sound systems to wirelessly receive audio from gaming devices, phones or tablets.

Tech Specs - Bluetooth 5.0, Audio Codecs: aptX Low Latency, aptX and SBC audio. Battery Life: 25+ hours Included - AirFly Pro, USB-C charging cable, travel pouch, keychain holder, quick start guide, manual

NOTES: AirPods must be INSIDE AirPod Case to enter pairing mode and we recommend turning off nearby bluetooth devices like your phone when pairing on planes. AirFly features industry leading Bluetooth with aptX Low Latency Codecs. If you are experiencing anything less than high quality audio, first check the audio source. Regarding latency, ensure your device supports Bluetooth 5.2

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page AirFly Pro easily switches from transmit to receive and has a reset button to clear the cache easily AirFly's compact size is perfect for travel. Use the included travel pouch to keep the cord handy. Charge before or during your flight with the included charging cable (can charge while using) Tip: Turn off your phone's Bluetooth before you begin pairing to avoid interference when pairing Next page 1 Transmit and Receive 2 The Perfect Size 3 Flexible Cable 4 Charge Anywhere 5 Support/Questions

Never Run out of Battery A battery life of 25+ hours covers even the longest flight. If you forget to charge before takeoff, AirFly Pro can be used while charging. Cords Ruining Your Workout? Wirelessly transmit audio from gym equipment. Use your AirPods, earbuds or wireless headphones anywhere with no more cords in the way. Send Audio to a Car Stereo Connect to your rental car without syncing your entire phone. Use on an older vehicle or classic car that doesn’t' have Bluetooth. Unlimited Applications Use AirFly Pro on your boat to stream music, or stream to that awesome non-Bluetooth speaker or device you can't part with.

AirFly Pro (in White or Black) AirFly Duo AirFly SE Features: Addition of Receive Mode (RX) for sending audio from your phone to AUX-IN Features: Ability to share audio between two headphones in-flight or elsewhere Features: Quick connect for easy pairing, battery life indicator, volume control Pairs With: up to two headphones Pairs With: up to two headphones Pairs With: one headphone Battery Life: 25+ hours Battery Life: 22+ hours Battery Life: 20+ hours Charges Via: USB-C Charges Via: USB-C Charges Via: USB-C

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AirFly Duo Bluetooth Wireless Transmitter
reviews.reviewText: Bought them to use on a long range international flight. Worked perfectly for my specific usage. Connectivity and ease of use was great. Slight transference delay when the pilot was speaking to the cabin, but overall communications for move watching were on point. Sound quality is solely dependent on the bluetooth headsets utilized. I used Bose in my instance and the quality was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like it’s supposed to
reviews.reviewText: We liked that it was fairly easily to pair both my husband’s, then my, earbuds with this model. It does work great for watching shows together that I had downloaded onto my iPad. In that case this plugs into my older iPad’s jack, then we can both watch a Netflix show together without bothering those around us. Unfortunately, we found that we cannot use this type of jack when we are flying business class overseas. At least on Delta, as we usually do. Their fancy earphones rely on a double jack plug.But we have also used the AirFly for taking cruise excursion tours. They provide wired “Quiet Voxes” which allow you to hear the guide, but which require wearing the thing hanging from your neck and a long wire that attaches to a looped earpiece. Very unwieldy. Now, we each Bluetooth to one of the QuietVox things, which is small enough to fit in my purse. With the AirFly attached to the top, it still all fits in my 8” high crossbody purse. We both wear our ear buds and aren’t tethered to wires like all the others in our bus tour group are. It works wonderfully for that.The battery life seems quite long, and charging is a snap. The included charging cord is rather short, so we used our longer USB-C cord. Also, pairing with earbuds/earphones is easy, and checking if the power is On or Off is also easy. We recommend this to anyone for its variety of uses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for flights, especially long ones.
reviews.reviewText: My husband has wireless earbuds and wanted to use them on our international flight. This was perfect. Easy to use. Has a tiny little bag that we keep it in. He didn't mention any lag. We have zero complaints about this or suggestions on how to improve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Seamless Audio Connectivity - A Four-Star Amazon Review
reviews.reviewText: The Twelve South AirFly Pro Bluetooth Wireless Audio Transmitter/Receiver has proven to be a reliable and versatile companion, enabling me to enjoy wireless audio wherever I go. This nifty gadget effortlessly bridges the gap between my AirPods and devices with a 3.5mm audio jack, earning it a solid four-star rating.The standout feature of the AirFly Pro is its seamless connectivity. Pairing my AirPods or wireless headphones with various devices like airplanes, gym equipment, TVs, iPads, and more has become a breeze. This has enhanced my audio experience during travel, workouts, and entertainment, allowing me to enjoy my favorite tunes or shows without being tied down by pesky cords.The dual functionality as both a transmitter and receiver is a significant advantage. Whether I need to transmit audio from my TV to my AirPods for late-night viewing or receive audio from gym equipment, the AirFly Pro has got me covered on both fronts. The versatility of this device makes it a valuable addition to my tech arsenal.The battery life of the AirFly Pro is commendable. With up to 16 hours of playback time on a single charge, it can keep up with my on-the-go lifestyle. Additionally, the USB-C charging port ensures quick and efficient charging, making it ready for use whenever I need it.The compact and lightweight design makes it easy to carry around in my bag or pocket. Its unobtrusive size and simple operation allow for hassle-free setup and use. The included travel pouch adds an extra layer of protection, ensuring it stays safe and secure during travel.One aspect that could be improved is the audio latency when used as a transmitter. While it generally performs well, there is a slight delay in audio transmission, which might be noticeable during fast-paced videos or gaming. However, this is a common issue with wireless audio transmitters, and it does not detract significantly from its overall performance.In conclusion, the Twelve South AirFly Pro Bluetooth Wireless Audio Transmitter/Receiver is a reliable and versatile solution for wireless audio connectivity. Its ease of use, long battery life, and dual functionality make it a valuable tool for enjoying audio on the go.Despite a minor audio latency issue, the AirFly Pro delivers on its promises, providing a seamless and cord-free audio experience. If you're seeking a practical and portable audio transmitter/receiver, the AirFly Pro is a smart investment that will undoubtedly enhance your audio adventures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel! Works seamlessly.
reviews.reviewText: This works seamlessly. You can use it on an airplane to watch the movie wirelessly. Just sync and plug it in. I used my AirPods and it was perfect. A note, although most have the single plugin, some planes still use the two prong connection. AirFly does have this same version with the 5.3 adapter, but you can use your own adapter if you still have one. This is small, easy to carry along and great to use. Awesome sound quality. Another thing…the cap that covers the plug when it’s not in use. Easy to drop and lose on a plane as it will roll. You might consider attaching a keychain to the top so you don’t lose it. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A bit hard to pair
reviews.reviewText: I had a bit of problem paring this device to my EarPods but once it did it worked well on the plane. There is a slight delay in the sound but not enough to be a problem. I had to replace my Bose wired noise canceling earbuds and this was a good alternative so I could use my wireless Apple earbuds instead of the crappy ones they give on the plane.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look ma! No more wires!
reviews.reviewText: I am a producer on a local radio talk show. Sometimes I have to monitor what’s actually going on the air, and for that, I have to use an actual radio. It was a pain to have earbuds with wires dangling, especially when they would get caught on my microphone, and on my professional wired headphones. This Airfly device allows me to plug it into the radio, and connect my JBL earbuds, making my radio monitoring completely wireless. I love it. I’m sure it’s also perfect for its intended use (listening to in-flight movies on airplane seat backs), but I don’t do a ton of flying! lol. Great product, does exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: I use this in airplanes when traveling long distances. Is small, easy to connect and the battery holds for a long time. I used it for a 13 hours flight and it did not die on me.
Excelente compra. No me tuve que preocupar por disfrutar las pelis en el avión usando mis propios audífonos ☺️
Me gustó mucho para viajar en aviones
Finally got to use this product. Works just as described. I used the noise-cancelling feature of my AirPods, which made a huge difference. So glad I purchased this.

Don't have any complaints with this product. Purchased it for an upcoming trip and it worked as advertised. I was initially thinking it was a bit overpriced but being able to use my own AirPods on board was a much more convenient experience than anticipated. Initially I wasn't sure how to test out the product prior to my trip but it does connect to other devices (such as an Nintento switch) so you can make sure it works before your flight.
Produto de excelente qualidade, conecta muito rápido, exatamente como no anúncio.
